Events.displayName: Oracle Web Services Manager - Policy Attachment

Category.name: WS-PolicyAttachment
Category.HelpText: The events are for WS PolicyAttachment

Attribute.name: PolicyChangeType
Attribute.HelpText: The type of change that occurred.

Attribute.name: PolicyURI
Attribute.HelpText: The URI which identifies the policy for which the event was triggered.(comma-separated list)

Attribute.name: PolicyCategory
Attribute.HelpText: The category of the policy for which the event was triggered.(comma-separated list)

Attribute.name: PolicyStatus
Attribute.HelpText: The status of the policy for which the event was triggered.(comma-separated list)

Attribute.name: ServiceEndpoint
Attribute.HelpText: The endpoint URI which identifies the service for which the event was triggered.

Attribute.name: PolicySubjRescPattern
Attribute.HelpText: The policy subject resource pattern which identifies the policy subject for which the event was triggered.

FilterPresetDefinition.helpText: Low filter preset .To be defined by the component
FilterPresetDefinition.name: Low
